name: 華國媛
objective:
Molecular biology mainly uses molecular methods to explore the production, composition, function and interaction of cells. The major topics in the classes are listed:
1.  Macromolecules and organelle of cells
2. The Nature of the Gene and the Genome,
3. Central Dogama: Transcription and Translation
4. The Cell Nucleus and the Control of Gene Expression
5.  Cellular Signal Transduciton and Cell-cell Interaction

Human immunity and cancer will also be topics included in the class.  The genes and protein involved in human immunity and cancer will be introduced.  The students are expected to learn in English.
